 <li><strong>. . . </strong> There also may be an increase in the number size and color of colored spots on the face This is largely due to sun exposure The skin may thin become dryer and develop wrinkles Although wrinkles are inevitable to some extent sun exposure and<strong>. . . </strong></li>
 <li><strong>. . . </strong> lips look shrunken The jawbone loses bone material reducing the size of the lower face The forehead nose and mouth thus look more pronounced Gums may also recede contributing to dental problems and changes in the appearance of the mouth RELATED<strong>. . . </strong></li>
 </ul>
